alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Windham, south central Tolland, north central Washington, southwestern Kent and southwestern Providence Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 809 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lebanon, or near Windham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Coventry, Windham, Plainfield, Willimantic, Killingly, Scituate, Glocester, Brooklyn, Exeter, West Greenwich, Columbia, Canterbury, Foster, Sterling, Hampton and Scotland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
